channel.title: [PI]Need Help from a java and client pro![PI]
channel.description:
I wanted to make my server client into a .jar file. So i found a guide on how to do that, but its for deltascape servers. The process is the same, but i need to change the main class :l Here s what im doing so far: Cmd> cd_Server Location
jar
jar_cvfm_neonscape.jar_manifest.txt_*.*
The manifest file has this in it:
'main-class: Client.java
' I know the problem is that i have to change the main class, but does anyone know what to on a PI sever?
Thanks:)
